name: HotBunz
description:
Premise


In a world where twerking is the only way to be respected in society, HotBunz is a game about how a new sport, the Bootylympics, allows the citizens of Buttopia to rise above the ranks by being as crass and show-boaty as they can.

The rules of the Bootylympics are as quirky as the Buttopians themselves. Participants must navigate through a series of challenges that showcase their ability to shimmy, shake, and twirl with unmatched finesse. From synchronized booty bouncing to gravity-defying farting, every move is meticulously judged by a panel of esteemed cheek connoisseurs.

Play as your favorite Buttopian in this physics-based 2D Platformer Party Game with your friends and claim all the glory. Always remember, Champion Buttopians always come dressed to kill.


- Play Solo to collect as many coins and buy character skins
- Play against friends in different game modes to really show them who's who
- Fart Fire (Pretty cool, we know)
- Dress your Buttopian up to show up and show off!
- Most Importantly, HAVE FUN!

Game Modes

Solo

Navigate through varying obstacle courses to collect keys and gold coins in a series of increasingly complex levels.

VS (King Of The Hill)

Everybody's your enemy, claim the flag and hold on to it for as long as you can while dodging those other loser Buttopians

Co-Op (Capture The Flag)

Play with a team member against an opposing team by capturing as many of their flags as you can.




Controls XBOX


A - Fart
B - SuperFart
RT - Grapple
LT - Steal Key From Player
L Analog - Movement

Keyboard


WASD - Movement
R Shift - Grapple
Space Bar - Fart
Next level - Space Bar
